name: Faith in the knight
description:
In this action-packed game, you play as a brave knight on a quest to defeat waves of monsters. As you hack and slash your way through the enemy horde, you can use the "dash" ability (E or right button on gamepad) to temporarily increase your faith level. 

However, be careful not to let your faith level get too high, as going over the limit will result in your death. You must also watch out for enemy attacks, as one hit from an enemy will also bring about your demise. To help you in your quest, you can use the "attack" ability by holding down the left mouse button Right trigger on gamepad. 

As you progress through the game, you will need to take care not to go beyond the map limits or suffer a premature end. Can you hold out for as long as possible and emerge victorious?
